  • Uses of Tree in works

    Methods in works with parameters of type Tree
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Object
    Lumberjack.cutTree(Tree tree)
    This method read the amount value for one tree and then create a new WoodPlanks object with the amount value equals to (tree.amount/1.8).
    For example if the original tree have a 180 in the amount value then it will be created a WoodPlanks object with 100 on the amount value.
    Also the method take the name of the tree and generate a new line for the action log showing the type of the tree and the amount of wooded planks generated.
